effect_name.description: The name of the effect, e.g., 'Fireball', 'Heal', 'Poison'

description.description: A brief description of what the effect does

magnitude.description: The magnitude of the effect, positive values increase the effect, negative values decrease it

duration.description: The duration in turns or seconds for which the effect persists

target_type.description: Who the effect targets: self, enemy, or ally

effect_type.description: The category of effect, for example a buff or a status effect

stackable.description: Whether the effect can stack if applied multiple times

icon_path.description: Path to the icon representing the effect

related_items.description: IDs of items that grant this effect

set_bonus_group.description: Optional group ID this effect belongs to for set bonus tracking
